entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Kugaaruk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 02:36 AM MST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -38.6°C

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 37.
